Just as a test I am trying to define my user agent for Heritrix 1.14.4 and =
Heritrix 3.1 as a mobile user agent so that it will receive back mostly jus=
t mobile web pages. However, no matter what I seem to try it says that my u=
ser-agent is not valid or when it does accept my mobile user agent...it jus=
t straight up doesn't work.

I went to see how the googlebot-mobile was doi=
ng it and adapted a user agent from it:

Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone=
 OS 4_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/532.9 (KHTML, like Gecko Version/=
4.0.5 Mobile/8B117 Safari/6531 .22.7 (compatible; heritrix/1.14.4 +MY_URL_H=
ERE)

Where MY_URL_HERE is set to the URL of the University where I work.

=
When it does accept the user agent above it does nothing different. It dete=
cts some mobile web pages (which is does regardless), but the way I need it=
 is to crawl mostly just mobile web pages.

Can anyone tell if I am doing s=
omething wrong?
